title: beads-mcp: Task substrate server
description: Native MCP interface to Beads task management, eliminating subprocess overhead in Agent0 and Agent Orchestra.
design: Tools: create_task, query_ready, update_status, get_blocked, add_dependency, get_stats. Direct SQLite access to beads DB.

title: research-mcp: Intelligence substrate server
description: Powers Intelbot and Inevitability Engine with structured research capabilities.
design: Tools: search_arxiv, fetch_paper, summarize_paper, search_web (Perplexity), fetch_rss, cache_source. Integrations: ArXiv API, OpenReview, Perplexity, RSS feeds.

title: media-pipeline-mcp: AV production server
description: Support ai-talkshow-cli and video generation workflows.
design: Tools: queue_render, render_status, cancel_render, ffmpeg_transcode, ffmpeg_concat, ffmpeg_overlay, elevenlabs_synthesize, generate_thumbnail, extract_waveform.

title: agent-mail-mcp: Inter-agent communication server
description: Expose Maildir-based agent messaging as MCP tools.
design: Tools: send_message, check_inbox, read_message, mark_read, subscribe_topic, broadcast.

title: substack-mcp: Publishing pipeline server
design: Tools: create_draft, update_draft, schedule_post, publish_now, get_analytics, list_posts, crosspost_linkedin, crosspost_twitter. Integrations: Substack API, LinkedIn API, Twitter API.

title: excel-audit-mcp: Data analysis server
description: Excel Auditor skill as native MCP for data analysis workflows.
design: Tools: read_excel, infer_schema, validate_data, quality_score, transform, export_csv, summarize_sheet.

title: wardley-mcp: Strategic mapping server
description: Strategic analysis for Inevitability Engine and planning workflows.
design: Tools: generate_map, analyze_evolution, suggest_positions, check_doctrine, find_opportunities, export_svg.

title: local-llm-mcp: Hybrid inference server
design: Tools: list_models, generate, embed, route, benchmark. Integrations: Ollama, LM Studio, llama.cpp.

title: prompt-lab-mcp: Prompt engineering server
description: Version-controlled prompt development based on AIPrompts and prompt-evolve.
design: Tools: save_prompt, load_prompt, list_prompts, test_prompt, compare_versions, optimize, interpolate.
